actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow an itemized deduction for amounts paid for planting, raising, and harvesting a vegetable garden.

summary.text: Allows, under the Internal Revenue Code, an itemized deduction for amounts paid for planting, raising, and harvesting a vegetable garden. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 219)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow an itemized deduction for amounts paid for planting, raising, and harvesting a vegetable garden.
